entry.def: Buddha is the title given to Gautama Siddhartha, the religious teacher and founder of Buddhism.
A Buddha is a statue or picture of the Buddha.

means.word_mean: 1. founder of Buddhism; worshipped as a god (c 563-483 BC)
2. one who has achieved a state of perfect enlightenment
